ohu 1988-1991 athara kalaya thula paudgalika anshaye karyansha injineruwarayeku lesa sewaya kaleya. 1991 di ohu mahamarga adhyaksha karyalaye, 15 wana pradeshiya adhyakshaka, nadaththu pradhana injineru aayathanaye nadaththu injineru lesa wada kirimata patan gaththeya. 1992-1993 athara kalaya thula ohu siya hamuda sewaya sampurna kala athara 1993-1994 athara kalaya thula siya rajakariya digatama karagena giyeya. 1994 sita 2000 dakwa kalaya thula piliwelin 4 wana pradeshiya mahamarga adhyaksha karyalaye; ohu asfalt palana injineru, asfalt kshethra injineru, asfalt saha salasum pradhana injineru lesa sewaya kaleya. 2000-2004 athara kalaya thula ohu kayisari 6 wana pradeshiya adhyaksha karyalaye rathawahana pradhana injineru saha niyojya pradeshiya kalamanakaru lesa path karana ladi. 2005 di ohu upaya marga sanwardhana departhamenthuwe pradhaniya lesath 2009 di wadasatahan ha adhikshana departhamenthuwe pradhaniya lesath path karana ladi.
